bug.summary: Timeseries order-by not working for date
bug.description: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/surendra1472>@surendra1472</denchmark-link> recently found this bug. When the order-by column is a date, timeseries crashes because the column (order by column is this case) is split into 3 columns for year, month and day, but the sorting is still done on the original column.
